description:
What can we offer you?

APERINOSTRUM !!!

It's our way to interpretate the afterwork. We will offer you a fantastic selection of three champagnes from one of the most prestigious "Maison" in Epernay (the land of champagne).

These amazing wines will be accompanied with three dishes to exalt the flavours and the AperiNostrum experience:

• Blanc de blanc Grand Cru (100% chardonnay) with calamari and octopus in a crunchy golden crust.

• Rosé de saignée (Premier Cru) with spinach cake crowned by an italian salsiccia, served with bio potato petals seasoned by fresh rosemary and thyme.

• Cuvée Prestige (50% chardonnay, 25% pinot noir, 25% pinot Meunier) with special green tea and grapes tiramisu.

Do not wait and become an AperiNostrum guest!
name: AperiNostrum: Soirée Trois Champagnes

description:
Last chance to try this menu conceived just for the summer!

Autumn is about to come and we’re already testing the new menu to match with three fabulous champagnes.

APERINOSTRUM: our way to interpretate the afterwork.

We will offer you a fantastic selection of three champagnes from one of the most prestigious "Maison" in Epernay (the land of champagne).

These amazing wines will be accompanied with three dishes to exalt the flavours and the AperiNostrum experience:


• Blanc de blanc Grand Cru (100% chardonnay) with focaccia, calamari and octopus in a crunchy golden crust.

• Rosé de saignée (Premier Cru) with spinach cake crowned by an italian salsiccia, served with bio potato petals seasoned by fresh rosemary and thyme.

• Cuvée Prestige (50% chardonnay, 25% pinot noir, 25% pinot Meunier) with special Japan green tea tiramisu.


Do not wait and become an AperiNostrum guest!

name: AperiNostrum: Soirée Trois Champagnes - Summer Edition! ***LAST CHANCE!***

description:
We're back!


Don’t miss the opportunity to participate in our upcoming event where you can meet new friends and try our new Fall dinner menu too!


We got new fantastic ideas to combine our fantastic selection of three champagnes from one of the most prestigious "Maison" in Epernay (the land of champagne).

Fine Champagne,good food and nice company..what more could you ask for?


AperiNostrum: our way to interpretate the afterwork.

These amazing wines will be accompanied with three dishes to exalt the flavours and the AperiNostrum experience:


• Blanc de blanc Grand Cru (100% chardonnay) with HomeMade rosemary focaccia and mini smoked salmon croissant party.

• Rosé de saignée (Premier Cru) with "Risotto Giuseppe Verdi". The best italian prosciutto and asparagus tips for a dish created by the French chef Pellaprat.

• Cuvée Prestige (50% chardonnay, 25% pinot noir, 25% pinot Meunier) with a special edition of the Alessandro's grape tiramisu.


Do not wait and become an AperiNostrum guest!


For Further Information visit us on FB => www.aperinostrum.com
name: AperiNostrum: Soirée Trois Champagnes - Fall Edition!

description:
Description


The city of Alba (Italy) is worldwide famous for its internationally recognised white truffles***. Its annual Truffle Market is the place where to go to find out everything about this extraordinary product. From this unique and heady scented place, AperiNostrum will get the best white truffles which will be served in a dedicated WHITE TRUFFLES MENU.

Do not miss this chance to taste an extraordinary piece of Italy: ONLY 1 AperiNostrum EVENT PER YEAR!

AperiNostrum: our way to interpretate the afterwork.


*** AperiNostrum intentionally chose the most valuable white truffle (instead of the black one) since it has the Best organoleptic properties like flavor and smell.

On the Menu

Starter

A simple duo of ingredients that will surprise: Quail eggs with white Alba truffle slices ~~ "Uovo di quaglia al tegamino con scaglie di tartufo bianco d'Alba".


Main Dish

Tajarin (traditional italian fresh pasta from Alba) with Bio butter and white Alba truffle slices ~~ "Tajarin al burro con tartufo bianco d'Alba".


Dessert

Sweet croissant and Italian meringue party.DrinksDolcetto d'Alba Red Wine from Piedmont (Italy) and Italian Coffee.

ALBA - Piedmont - Italy
name: AperiNostrum presents...His Majesty "The WHITE TRUFFLE of Alba"

description:
Description

The great opera composer was humble when it came to his music, but not so much when the subject was cooking. A letter from Verdi's wife regarding a possible cooking competition between Verdi and an actress by the name of Ristori stated as follows:

"By the way, if La Ristori believes she will hold supremacy in the matter of tagliatelli, Verdi counts on eclipsing her with risotto, which truly he makes in divine fashion.”

The Verdi's risotto recipe did not survive, but we can propose you a recipe dedicated to Verdi conceived by Henri-Paul Pellaprat [masked]), the chef often called the father of modern French cooking. Such a risotto is a perfect harmony of mushrooms, asparagus, Prosciutto crudo di Parma, tomatoes, parmigiano and cream.

In the heart of Brussels (SABLON), you will have the chance to taste this MENU combined with our fantastic selection of three champagnes from one of the most prestigious "Maison" in Epernay (the land of champagne).


AperiNostrum: our way to interpretate the afterwork.

On the Menu 

Starter
Champagne Blanc de blanc Grand Cru (100% chardonnay) with HomeMade "Herbes de Provence" Focaccia and smoked salmon-cheese-aneth croissant party.

Main Dish

Champagne Rosé de saignée (Premier Cru) with "Risotto Giuseppe Verdi" accompanied by crusty BIO potatoes


Dessert


Champagne Cuvée Prestige (50% chardonnay, 25% pinot noir, 25% pinot Meunier) with a special edition of the Alessandro's grape tiramisu.

Drinks


Trois Champagnes Cuvée Prestiges: Blanc de blanc Grand Cru - Rosé de saignée Premier Cru - Brut Cuvée Prestige


For Further Information visit us on FB => www.aperinostrum.com
name: AperiNostrum - Homage to Giuseppe Verdi’s RISOTTO & Champagne
